DOC.brief_summary: The investigators are conducting a study entitled 'Experience of Arab American Women with Breast Cancer: In-depth Interviews' through which they hope to learn more about Arab women's experience with breast cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Experience of Arab American Women With Breast Cancer: In-depth Interviews
DOC.criteria: AMBER participant diagnosed with breast cancer who attended at least 1 support group meeting Aged 18 to 85 Arabicspeaking
DOC.keyword: The Arab American Breast Cancer Education and Referral Program (AMBER)
